dict.string: TPanel needs network access to connect to a controler (NetLinx). Also for intercom and SIP network connection is necessary.

Microphone access is needed for intercom and SIP. Intercom is the possibility to establish a connection to another instance of TPanel on another device. Then the microphone is redirected to the other device and also the other way around like a phone. SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) is a standard way for VOIP (Voice Over IP). TPanel supports this protocol and needs access to the microphone to let the user talk to another SIP device.
